description: Can an app help you exercise? Lizzie and Marketplace Tech's Ben Johnson investigate.
contentencoded:
Fitness Apps are popular, really popular. But they have their own set of challenges, and what are these Apps doing with all your data?
 
Marketplace Tech’s Ben Johnson and Lizzie O’Leary work out a few fitness apps like One Hundred Pushups, and explore their challenges.

title: Tech IRL: Work it harder, make it better (with an app)
teaser: Can an app help you exercise? Lizzie and Marketplace Tech's Ben Johnson investigate.
